comment.author: 34748948@N07
comment._content: This is my grandmother's brother and his family. I believe they moved to Quebec but they lost contact in the 60s. I've lived in Canada myself for the past 11 years and was always curious about this...

comment.author: 33147718@N05
comment._content: [http://www.flickr.com/photos/34748948@N07] That's fantastic - I'm glad you came across our Flickr collection. If you have any further information on the Kleistbergs we'd love to hear about it. Email phyde@anmm.gov.au. Cheers!
comment.authorname: Australian National Maritime Museum on The Commons
